content.query:
IF NOT EXISTS ( SELECT  *
                 FROM    sys.schemas
                 WHERE   name = 'miPINS' )
     EXEC('CREATE SCHEMA [miPINS]');
 GO

 --CREATE VIEW FOR IMS Attribute PBI Report

 CREATE OR ALTER VIEW miPINS.vw_mipins_IMS_Attribute
 AS

 SELECT
	CASE WHEN BDCAIDLegacy = 'No Info'
		 THEN IMSAttributeID
		 ELSE BDCAIDLegacy
	END      																						AS [attribute_id],
	AttributeID                                                                                     AS [attribute_GUID],
	BDCEntityNumberContainer																		AS [entity_number_container],
	BDCAttributeName                                                                                AS [attribute_name],
	IsPersonalData                                                                                  AS [is_personal_data],
	MinimiseAfterProcessingc                                                                        AS [minimise_after_processing],
	IsSpecialCategoryData                                                                           AS [is_this_special_category_data],
	RetentionPeriod                                                                                 AS [retention_period],
	IMSAttributeInformationOwnerc                                                                   AS [attribute_information_owner],
	IMSAttributeType                                                                                AS [type],
	IMSAttributeStatus                                                                              AS [status],
	IMSAttributePriority                                                                            AS [priority],
	IMSAttributeResolution                                                                          AS [resolution],
	IMSAttributeWorkLog                                                                             AS [work_log],
	NULL                                                                                            AS [fk_entity_id],
	IMSAttributeDateModified                                                                        AS [date_modified]
FROM [odw_harmonised_db].[dbo].[ims_attribute_dim]
WHERE IsActive = 'Y'
GO
